title: MSBuild does not create a directory for the log file
body:
When you specify a log file path that contains a folder that does not exist, MSBuild gives an error:

```
msbuild /flp:logfile=%TEMP%\foo\foo.log
Microsoft (R) Build Engine version 14.0.25420.1
Copyright (C) Microsoft Corporation. All rights reserved.

MSBUILD : Logger error MSB4104: Failed to write to log file "C:\Users\jeffkl\AppData\Local\Temp\foo\foo.log". Could not find a part of the path 'C:\Users\jeffkl\AppData\Local\Temp\foo\foo.log'.
```

I wish MSBuild would create `%TEMP%\foo` so that I don't have to.
